text: Jerusalemi kumapima me'nea nontamine Juda kini vahe'mokizmi nontamimo'za, Tofeti mopamo'ma hiaza hu'za Nagri navurera agrua osugahaze. Na'ankure ana nontamimofo agofetura marerita monafima me'nea hanafitaminte, mananentake'za insensia kre mna nevuta, kaza osu havi anumzantamintera waini tina tagita ofa hu'naze.
